'''1.20.13''' is a minor update to {{el|ee}}, released on November 8, 2023, which fixes some bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=http://web.archive.org/web/20231109160806/https://educommunity.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/16763242057748-What-s-new-in-the-Trails-Tales-Update-v1-20-12-|title=What's New in Trails and Tails (v1.20.13)|website=Minecraft Education Support}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Game mode]]'''
* Changed default game mode for new worlds back to creative.

=== General ===
'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* Improved some multiplayer error messages to make them easier to understand.

== Fixes == 
* Some sign-in failures will be automatically retired.
